title: 第六版搭载了全新战斗机制的 Java 版快照现已放出
author: 电量量
txt_content:
本帖最后由 电量量 于 2020-8-8 12:55 编辑 

After half a year of hiatus, here's version 6 of the combat test snapshots!
Again there are some radical changes, which means we're still not ready to move on to phase 2 of the tests (which means, fewer system changes and more focused on number balancing). If you have a keen eye you will notice that we are slowly progressing more and more towards something similar to 1.8, but recent twitter comments are saying v5 was great, so... I'm trying to find the sweet spot. Remember, squeaky wheel gets the oil!
半年的空档之后，第六版战斗快照来啦！
这次快照还是有一些激进的更改，也就意味着我们还没有准备好继续到测试的第二阶段（也就是系统上的更改少一些，数量上的平衡多一些）。如果你眼细的话就会发现我们正在一步一步向类似 1.8 的东西走，但是最近的 Twitter 评论又说第五版挺好的，所以...我就在尝试找到当中的平衡点。记住，大问题解决的会更快的！
Changes compared to previous test和之前快照相比的更改
Redesigned aim assist again. Different approach this time, NO LESS CONTROVERSIAL!又重新设计辅助瞄准了。这次是不同的方法，不过依旧很具争议！
Removed "Coyote Time"移除了“容错时间”（译者注：如果准星瞄到目标，在接下来的一定时间里不管目标的方位如何，仍会击中目标，其中的时间称之为“Coyote Time”，容错时间）Entities with bounding boxes that are smaller than 0.9 of a block are inflated (for targeting purposes) to be 0.9 of a block (rabbits, bats, etc)如果实体的碰撞箱比 0.9 个方块小，那么瞄准时的碰撞箱就会膨胀到 0.9 格Swords always have sweeping attacks again, axes have it with the Sweeping enchantment剑现在默认又可以横扫了，斧也可以附上横扫之刃附魔来横扫Missing now only puts a 4 tick delay until the next attack regardless of weapon.如果打偏了，那么无论武器，攻击冷却时间只有 4 刻Increased base reach to 3 (was 2.5) and removed bonus reach for delayed attacks基础攻击距离增加到了 3（原来是 2.5）并移除了冷却完成时攻击的距离加成

Changes to shields:盾牌的更改：Shields now only protect up to 5 damage for melee attacks (still 100% against projectiles)盾牌现在对于近战伤害只能防御最多 5 点伤害了（对于弹射物仍旧是 100%）Shields recover faster after an attack盾牌在攻击之后的恢复更短了

Changes to axes:斧的更改：Renamed Chopping to CleavingChopping（削切，非标准译名）改名为 Cleaving（劈裂，非标准译名）Removed other weapon enchantments from the enchanting table. The axes simply had too many possible enchantments. It also feels a little bit fitting with a rare Cleaving enchantment than a common Sharpness enchantment for axes移除了在附魔台上附魔除 Cleaving（劈裂，非标准译名）之外其他武器附魔（译者注：这里仅指斧，并仍可以使用铁砧附魔）。很简单，斧的附魔太多了。而且斧上来点高级的 Cleaving（劈裂，非标准译名）比起锋利这种平庸无奇的附魔也显得更加般配

Changes to bows / projectiles:弓 / 弹射物的更改：Player momentum is added to thrown projectiles, but only in the direction you are aiming玩家移动时的动量也会对玩家扔出的弹射物施加，不过仅在你瞄准的方向Bow and arrow accuracy now slowly decreases the longer you pull the bow弓箭的精准度现在随着拉弓时间会逐渐变差

Changes to food and hunger:食物（译者注：下面的“吃东西”专指吃，不指喝药水和牛奶）和饥饿的更改：Reverted eating time to 32 ticks把吃东西的时间回退到了 32 刻Eating is now interrupted if something hits you如果你被击中（译者注：这里仅指受到的近战和远程打击，不包括岩浆、药水等伤害），吃东西就会被打断Natural healing is even faster (2 seconds, was 3 seconds)天然生命值回复甚至更快了（2 秒，先前是 3 秒）Natural healing drains food 50% slower天然生命值回复对食物的消耗少了 50%By popular request - Reintroduced the rule that sprinting requires more than 6 points of food热门请求 - 现在疾跑又需要 6 点饥饿值了

Other changes:其他更改：Removed the attack indicator completely since it is no longer used by any systems移除了战斗指示，毕竟这玩意已经弃用了Fixed knockback calculation修复了击退计算Fixed damage value on items being off-by-one client-side修复了物品伤害值在客户端堆溢出的问题Fixed bug that caused players to be unable to attack/interract after respawning修复了玩家重生后无法攻击 / 交互的问题Nerfed Sweeping Edge enchantment to 25/33/37.5 percent (was 50/66/75%)把横扫之刃削弱到了 25/33/37.5%（原先是 50/66/75%）

Again, thank you all for your input!还是一样，感谢你们的反馈！




Previous post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/i5cvlh/combat_test_version_6/
之前那版：https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/i5cvlh/combat_test_version_6/
Installation instructions:安装步骤：
在此网址下载该压缩文件：https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/5a8ceec8681ed96ab6ecb9607fb5d19c8a755559/1_16_combat-0.zip在您的“version”文件夹中解压此压缩文件（若不知道它在哪，烦请继续阅读）在您的启动器中创建一个新的配置并且选中版本“pending 1_16_combat-0”点击"开始游戏"，剩余的所需内容应会被自动下载记得在一个新的世界开始游戏！该版本不与其他快照兼容！
Finding the Minecraft application folder:如何找到你的 Minecraft 安装文件夹:
Windows：点击 Windows 徽标键 + R 组合键，并在弹出的窗口内键入“%appdata%/.minecraft”后点击确定macOS：打开访达，在菜单中选择前往，然后选择前往文件夹并键入 ~/Library/Application Support/minecraftLinux：其位于路径 ~/.minecraft 或 /home/<你的用户名>/.minecraft/
Once you have the launcher set up you can download the server files from there as well.若你已在启动器成功安装该快照后，你可以在启动器中下载服务端文件。

FEEDBACK SITE反馈站
In addition to replying here on reddit, you can head over to the feedback site to discuss specific topics here: https://aka.ms/JavaCombatSnap除了在原帖下方回复之外，也可在我们的反馈站内讨论
Cheers!祝游玩愉快！
